Uses of Package
com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.model

  • Packages that use com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.model 
    Package Description
    com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.backend
    Backend layer for the ODP (Ordine di Pagamento) system.
    com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.backend.repos
    Data access layer for ODP persistence.
    com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.backend.repos.csv
    CSV file-based repository implementation for ODP data storage.
    com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.backend.services
    Service layer for ODP business logic and authorization.
    com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.frontend
    Frontend presentation layer for the ODP (Ordine di Pagamento) system.
    com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.frontend.erparams
    Form field parameters (ERParams) with validation and data binding for ODP forms.
    com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.frontend.forms
    User interface forms for ODP management.
    com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.frontend.mappers
    Data mappers for transforming between UI form data and domain models.
    com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.model
    Domain model classes for the ODP (Ordine di Pagamento) payment order system.
  • Classes in com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.model used by com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.backend 
    Class and Description
    Odp
    ODP (Ordine di Pagamento) Model Represents a payment order with all related information
    OdpUser
    Represents a user in the ODP (Ordine di Pagamento) system.
  • Classes in com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.model used by com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.backend.repos 
    Class and Description
    Odp
    ODP (Ordine di Pagamento) Model Represents a payment order with all related information
    OdpAccountVDS
    Represents an Account/VDS in the ODP system.
    OdpAuthorizationFlow
    Represents the complete authorization flow for an ODP (Ordine di Pagamento).
    OdpAuthorizationStep
    Represents a single authorization step in an ODP (Ordine di Pagamento) workflow.
    OdpCDC
    Represents a CDC (Centro di Costo / Cost Center) in the ODP system.
    OdpCDR
    Represents a CDR (Centro di Ricavo / Revenue Center) in the ODP system.
    OdpCompany
    Represents a company in the ODP (Ordine di Pagamento) system.
    OdpCurrency
    Represents a currency in the ODP system.
    OdpSearchCriteria
    Search criteria for filtering ODPs (Ordine di Pagamento).
    OdpSortCriteria
    Sort criteria for ODP search results data grid.
    OdpSupplier
    Represents a supplier in the ODP system.
    OdpUser
    Represents a user in the ODP (Ordine di Pagamento) system.
